CUSTOMER 360 GUIDE FOR RETAIL
Solution Kits for Retail and B2C

Enhance your retail business by implementing one or more solution kits. Get product recommendations, workflow details, and instructions to help you implement the solution from start to finish.

Customer 360 Guides: Quick Look
SOLUTION KIT	VIEW IN SALESFORCE DOCS	DOWNLOAD KIT AS A PDF


Turn Abandoned Carts into Completed Sales

Connect with shoppers who add items to their carts but don’t finish orders.\n Send personalized behavioral messages that encourage them to return and buy.

	View Now	Download PDF


Redeem Coupons

Offer targeted customer journeys and increase positive purchasing decisions. Increase completed purchases, personalize the experience, and track coupon usage.

	View Now	Download PDF


Order on Behalf of a Customer

Place orders on behalf of shoppers who need assistance because they can’t access the Internet or find the products they want to purchase.

	View Now	Download PDF


Personalize Marketing Recommendations

Keep shoppers interested in your products using email recommendations based on merchandise that your customers already purchased from you.

	View Now	Download PDF


Keep Customers In the Loop with Transactional Email

Inform customers on the status of their orders through email while reducing call volume to your service centers. Increase storefront visits.

	View Now	Download PDF


Engage Customers with Conversational Commerce

Provide richer customer service and drive sales when you implement live agent chat or chat bots within Commerce Cloud. Build brand loyalty, check order status, and offer extra assistance at the hands of service agents.

	View Now	Download PDF


Implement Seamless Cross-Cloud Identity

Unify customer data with a single identity for each customer across your ecommerce sites and your communities. Enable one identity and give the customer visibility through the entire product catalog.

	View Now	Download PDF


Explore Cross-Cloud Engagement Data Models

Improve customer loyalty by establishing a common profile for each customer across Marketing Cloud, Commerce Cloud, and Service Cloud. Determine the best system of record for each type of customer data to take advantage of out-of-the-box cloud integrations.

	View Now	Download PDF


Run Conversational Campaigns for WhatsApp

Link customers directly from marketing messages to a live WhatsApp chat with your agent or chatbot for any questions about the product promotion.

	View Now	Download PDF


Run Conversational Campaigns for SMS

Link customers directly from marketing messages to a live SMS chat with your agent or chatbot for any questions about the product promotion.

	View Now	Download PDF


Communicate Store Changes

Build trust with your customers by keeping them updated on your store policies, hours, and any changes to locations.

	View Now	Download PDF


Schedule an Appointment

Implement scalable processes to let shoppers schedule appointments to meet locally managed or customer-preferred social distancing preferences.

	View Now	Download PDF


Facilitate Curbside Pickup

Prepare for the customer's arrival, fulfill curbside orders, and complete fulfillment without logging in to multiple systems.

	View Now	Download PDF


Offer Buy Online, Pick Up in Store (BOPIS)

Enable shoppers to buy products online for local store pickup through a Salesforce B2C Commerce storefront.

	View Now	Download PDF
